efs
v. 0.3.0
  1. org.efs.timer

Uses of Package
org.efs.timer

Packages that use org.efs.timer
Package
Description
org.efs.timer
efs provides a high precision timer via EfsScheduledExecutor which provides a similar functionality as ScheduledExecutorService with the difference that expired timer tasks are dispatched to an efs agent's event queue.
  • Classes in org.efs.timer used by org.efs.timer
    Class
    Description
    EfsScheduledExecutor
    Executes given timer, IEfsAgent pairs at a specified time.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder
    Builder for constructing EfsDispatcher instance.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.CancelReason
    Provides reason for a timer no longer running.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.IEfsTimer
    A scheduled timer task which may be active, expired, or canceled.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.TimerState
    An efs-scheduled timer may be in one of three states: waiting for an active timer to expire, timer has expired and is no longer active, and timer is canceled, will never expire, and is no longer active.
    EfsScheduledExecutor.TimerType
    Enumerates supported timer type: single shot, repeated at a fixed rate, and repeated at a fixed delay.
    EfsTimerEvent
    Event reporting a timer expiration.
